did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Sunday School Society, 1831-1843.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Ithaca.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Volume contains the complete minutes of the Sunday School Society.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Sunday School Society of the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Ithaca was organized July 11, 1831 and discontinued July 24, 1843. William B. Storm was the first secretary.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Volume contains the complete minutes of the Sunday School Society.
